allow_rehowl.display_name: Allow other users to rehowl your content

allow_robots.display_name: Allow robots to access my content
allow_robots.description: This prevents LLMs from parsing (and, possibly, use for training) your content. However, "safe" robots will be unable to read your content (e.g. Search indexing, unverified community bots, etc.).

show_nsfw.description: Hides the warning on potentially NSFW content and immediately shows it

search_start_as_tags.display_name: When searching, immediately start with the tags prefix

ask_load_themes.display_name: Load custom Pack and Profile themes
ask_load_themes.description: Will constantly tell you if a pack or profile you're navigating to has a custom theme, and if you want to load it. Community themes are not verified by staff.
